name: Guns 'n' Stallions
description:
Catch the train, kill the bad guys, grab the cash!

[ DOWNLOAD LINK BELOW ]

- CONTROLS -

WASD - Move your character

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Aim

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Shoot

R - Reload (Reload whilst aiming to load a single round into the chamber, release the aim button and reload to fill the chamber)

F - Toggle full-screen

SPACE - Jump to train

ENTER - Start game / Select menu item

ESC - Pause / Settings menu

- INFORMATION - 

A game by NPJarcade, written in two weeks for CGA Jam 2017.

- Catch up to the train using your trusty steed

- Shoot the bad guys with your revolver

- Keep an eye on your ammo counter and remember to reload!

- Take cover behind boxes

- Collect moonshine to restore your health

- Grab the cash and reach the end of the stage

- CREDITS -

Follow me on Twitter @NPJarcade

Programming, artwork and graphics by NPJarcade, UK, 2017.

SFX randomly generated using ChipTone - http://sfbgames.com/chiptone

Music created using Beepbox - http://www.beepbox.co
